quiz.question: _____ verse
quiz.explanation: 诗句，无韵诗。Shakespeare wrote in blank verse. 莎士比亚用无韵诗写作。

quiz.question: averse __ ____
quiz.explanation: 反对的，反对风险。Investors are averse to risk. 投资者反对风险。

quiz.question: traverse ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 穿越，穿越沙漠。They had to traverse the desert. 他们不得不穿越沙漠。

quiz.question: ____'_ obverse
quiz.explanation: 正面，硬币的正面。The coin's obverse shows the president. 硬币的正面显示总统。

quiz.question: adverse ______
quiz.explanation: 不利的，不利的影响。The drug had an adverse effect. 这种药物有不利的影响。

quiz.question: reverse ____
quiz.explanation: 倒退，倒档。Put the car in reverse gear. 把车挂倒档。

quiz.question: diverse ________
quiz.explanation: 多样的，多样的观众。The show attracted a diverse audience. 演出吸引了多样的观众。

quiz.question: inverse ________
quiz.explanation: 逆向的，逆向函数。Calculate the inverse function. 计算逆向函数。

quiz.question: ______ converse
quiz.explanation: 交谈，随意交谈。They engaged in casual converse. 他们进行随意交谈。

quiz.question: perverse ________
quiz.explanation: 乖张的，乖张的行为。His perverse behavior was troubling. 他乖张的行为令人不安。

quiz.question: reimburse ________
quiz.explanation: 报销，报销费用。The company will reimburse expenses. 公司会报销费用。

quiz.question: disburse _____
quiz.explanation: 支付，支付资金。The treasurer would disburse funds. 财务主管会支付资金。

quiz.question: ____ recourse
quiz.explanation: 求助，寻求求助。They had to seek recourse to the law. 他们不得不寻求法律的求助。

quiz.question: _______ _ discourse
quiz.explanation: 演讲，发表演讲。The professor would deliver a discourse. 教授会发表演讲。

quiz.question: purse ____
quiz.explanation: 噘嘴，噘嘴。She would purse lips in disapproval. 她会不满地噘嘴。

quiz.question: _____ impasse
quiz.explanation: 僵局，陷入僵局。Negotiations would reach impasse. 谈判会陷入僵局。

quiz.question: ________ largesse
quiz.explanation: 慷慨施舍，慷慨的施舍。The patron's generous largesse helped. 赞助人慷慨的施舍有所帮助。

quiz.question: ____ finesse
quiz.explanation: 技巧，展示技巧。The diplomat would show finesse. 外交官会展示技巧。

quiz.question: _________ fosse
quiz.explanation: 壕沟，防御壕沟。They dug a defensive fosse. 他们挖了防御壕沟。

quiz.question: _______'_ posse
quiz.explanation: 一队人，警长的一队人。The sheriff's posse tracked the outlaws. 警长的一队人追踪歹徒。

quiz.question: ________ clause
quiz.explanation: 条款，合同条款。Read the contract clause carefully. 仔细阅读合同条款。

quiz.question: disabuse __ ______
quiz.explanation: 纠正，纠正观念。I must disabuse of notion. 我必须纠正这个观念。

quiz.question: accuse __ _____
quiz.explanation: 指控，指控欺诈。They would accuse of fraud. 他们会指控欺诈。

quiz.question: defuse _______
quiz.explanation: 缓和，缓和紧张。Humor can defuse tension. 幽默可以缓和紧张。

quiz.question: diffuse _____
quiz.explanation: 散射，散射光线。The curtain would diffuse light. 窗帘会散射光线。

quiz.question: infuse ______
quiz.explanation: 注入，注入能量。The speech would infuse energy. 演讲会注入能量。

quiz.question: profuse ________
quiz.explanation: 大量的，大量出血。The wound caused profuse bleeding. 伤口造成大量出血。

quiz.question: transfuse _____
quiz.explanation: 输血，输血。Doctors had to transfuse blood. 医生不得不输血。

quiz.question: _________ recluse
quiz.explanation: 隐士，孤僻的隐士。He became a withdrawn recluse. 他成了孤僻的隐士。

quiz.question: muse __ ____
quiz.explanation: 沉思，沉思人生。He would muse on life's meaning. 他会沉思人生的意义。

quiz.question: hypotenuse ______
quiz.explanation: 斜边，斜边长度。Calculate the hypotenuse length. 计算斜边长度。

quiz.question: _____ warehouse
quiz.explanation: 仓库，大型仓库。They stored goods in a large warehouse. 他们在大型仓库储存货物。

quiz.question: espouse _ _____
quiz.explanation: 支持，支持事业。He would espouse a cause passionately. 他会热情地支持事业。

quiz.question: carouse ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 狂欢，整夜狂欢。They would carouse all night. 他们会整夜狂欢。

quiz.question: grouse ____
quiz.explanation: 松鸡，松鸡狩猎。They went on a grouse hunt. 他们去松鸡狩猎。

quiz.question: souse _______
quiz.explanation: 腌制，腌制鲱鱼。They would souse herring in brine. 他们会在盐水中腌制鲱鱼。

quiz.question: ______ ruse
quiz.explanation: 计谋，巧妙的计谋。It was a clever ruse. 这是巧妙的计谋。

quiz.question: abstruse ______
quiz.explanation: 深奥的，深奥的理论。The abstruse theory confused students. 深奥的理论让学生困惑。

quiz.question: browse ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 浏览，浏览网页。She would browse the web for hours. 她会浏览网页数小时。

quiz.question: debate ____
quiz.explanation: 辩论，辩论队。She joined the debate team. 她加入了辩论队。

quiz.question: ___ rebate
quiz.explanation: 回扣，税收回扣。They received a tax rebate. 他们收到了税收回扣。

quiz.question: celibate ______
quiz.explanation: 独身的，独身的牧师。The celibate priest took vows. 独身的牧师宣誓。

quiz.question: _____ reprobate
quiz.explanation: 堕落者，彻底的堕落者。He was an utter reprobate. 他是彻底的堕落者。

quiz.question: exacerbate ________
quiz.explanation: 加剧，加剧紧张。The incident would exacerbate tensions. 这起事件会加剧紧张。

quiz.question: incubate ____
quiz.explanation: 孵化，孵化蛋。The hen would incubate eggs. 母鸡会孵化蛋。

quiz.question: placate ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 安抚，安抚人群。He tried to placate the crowd. 他试图安抚人群。

quiz.question: desiccate _____
quiz.explanation: 使干燥，使水果干燥。Sun would desiccate fruit. 阳光会使水果干燥。

quiz.question: deprecate ________
quiz.explanation: 反对，反对暴力。We must deprecate violence. 我们必须反对暴力。

quiz.question: eradicate _______
quiz.explanation: 根除，根除疾病。Vaccines help eradicate disease. 疫苗帮助根除疾病。

quiz.question: abdicate ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 退位，退王位。The king would abdicate the throne. 国王会退王位。

quiz.question: medicate _ _____
quiz.explanation: 用药，给伤口用药。Clean and medicate a wound. 清洁并给伤口用药。

quiz.question: indicate _ _____
quiz.explanation: 表明，表明趋势。The data indicate a trend. 数据表明趋势。

quiz.question: vindicate ______
quiz.explanation: 证明正当，证明权利正当。The ruling would vindicate rights. 裁决会证明权利正当。

quiz.question: adjudicate _______
quiz.explanation: 裁决，裁决争端。The court will adjudicate dispute. 法院将裁决争端。

quiz.question: pontificate _________
quiz.explanation: 武断地说教，傲慢地武断地说教。He would pontificate pompously. 他会傲慢地武断地说教。

quiz.question: delicate _______
quiz.explanation: 微妙的，微妙的平衡。Maintain a delicate balance. 保持微妙的平衡。

quiz.question: implicate __ _____
quiz.explanation: 牵连，牵连欺诈。Evidence would implicate in fraud. 证据会牵连欺诈。

quiz.question: complicate ______
quiz.explanation: 使复杂化，使事情复杂化。Don't complicate matter further. 不要进一步使事情复杂化。

quiz.question: supplicate ___
quiz.explanation: 恳求，恳求上帝。They would supplicate God for mercy. 他们会恳求上帝宽恕。

quiz.question: explicate _ ______
quiz.explanation: 阐明，阐明理论。The professor would explicate a theory. 教授会阐明理论。

quiz.question: communicate _______
quiz.explanation: 沟通，清楚地沟通。Always communicate clearly. 始终清楚地沟通。

quiz.question: prevaricate __ _____
quiz.explanation: 支吾其词，在回答中支吾其词。Don't prevaricate in reply. 不要在回答中支吾其词。

quiz.question: lubricate _____
quiz.explanation: 润滑，润滑齿轮。Regularly lubricate gears. 定期润滑齿轮。

quiz.question: intricate _______
quiz.explanation: 复杂的，复杂的图案。The carpet had an intricate pattern. 地毯有复杂的图案。

quiz.question: masticate ____
quiz.explanation: 咀嚼，咀嚼食物。Chew and masticate food thoroughly. 充分咀嚼食物。

quiz.question: domesticate _______
quiz.explanation: 驯养，驯养动物。Humans learned to domesticate animals. 人类学会了驯养动物。

quiz.question: prognosticate ____
quiz.explanation: 预言，预言厄运。Prophets would prognosticate doom. 先知会预言厄运。

quiz.question: intoxicate ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 使陶醉，用酒使陶醉。Don't intoxicate with wine. 不要用酒使陶醉。

quiz.question: defalcate _____
quiz.explanation: 挪用公款，挪用公款资金。The accountant would defalcate funds. 会计会挪用公款资金。

quiz.question: inculcate ______
quiz.explanation: 灌输，灌输价值观。Parents inculcate values in children. 父母给孩子灌输价值观。

quiz.question: dislocate ________
quiz.explanation: 使脱臼，使肩膀脱臼。The fall would dislocate shoulder. 跌倒会使肩膀脱臼。

quiz.question: reciprocate ________
quiz.explanation: 回报，回报善意。She would reciprocate kindness. 她会回报善意。

quiz.question: ______ advocate
quiz.explanation: 倡导者，公众倡导者。He became a public advocate. 他成为公众倡导者。

quiz.question: equivocate __
quiz.explanation: 含糊其辞，对...含糊其辞。Don't equivocate on the issue. 不要对这个问题含糊其辞。

quiz.question: demarcate ________
quiz.explanation: 划定界限，划定界限边界。The treaty would demarcate boundary. 条约会划定界限边界。

quiz.question: bifurcate ____
quiz.explanation: 分叉，分叉成。The road would bifurcate into two paths. 道路会分叉成两条路。

quiz.question: obfuscate ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 使混淆，使问题混淆。Don't obfuscate the issue. 不要使问题混淆。

quiz.question: coruscate ____ ___
quiz.explanation: 闪耀，以机智闪耀。His remarks would coruscate with wit. 他的言论会以机智闪耀。

quiz.question: sedate ______
quiz.explanation: 沉着的，沉着的举止。He had a sedate manner. 他有沉着的举止。

quiz.question: antedate ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 早于，早于事件。These ruins antedate the event. 这些遗迹早于事件。

quiz.question: elucidate _______
quiz.explanation: 阐明，阐明概念。Let me elucidate concept further. 让我进一步阐明概念。

quiz.question: _________ candidate
quiz.explanation: 候选人，政治候选人。The political candidate campaigned hard. 政治候选人努力竞选。

quiz.question: consolidate _____
quiz.explanation: 巩固，巩固权力。The leader would consolidate power. 领导者会巩固权力。

quiz.question: liquidate ______
quiz.explanation: 清算，清算资产。The company had to liquidate assets. 公司不得不清算资产。

quiz.question: __________ mandate
quiz.explanation: 授权，政府授权。The government mandate was clear. 政府授权很明确。

quiz.question: inundate ____ ________
quiz.explanation: 淹没，被请求淹没。They would inundate with requests. 他们会被请求淹没。

quiz.question: accommodate _____
quiz.explanation: 容纳，容纳需求。We can accommodate needs. 我们可以容纳需求。

quiz.question: nucleate _______
quiz.explanation: 成核，成核沸腾。Nucleate boiling occurs in the pot. 成核沸腾在锅中发生。

quiz.question: permeate ___ ___
quiz.explanation: 渗透，渗透空气。The scent would permeate the air. 香味会渗透空气。

quiz.question: delineate __________
quiz.explanation: 描绘，描绘边界。Clearly delineate boundaries. 清楚地描绘边界。

quiz.question: procreate _______
quiz.explanation: 繁殖，快速繁殖。Some species procreate quickly. 一些物种快速繁殖。

quiz.question: nauseate _______
quiz.explanation: 使恶心，使观众恶心。The graphic scenes would nauseate viewers. 血腥场景会使观众恶心。

quiz.question: propagate ______
quiz.explanation: 繁殖，繁殖植物。Learn to propagate plants from cuttings. 学习从插条繁殖植物。

quiz.question: divagate ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 离题，离题。Don't divagate from topic. 不要离题。

quiz.question: ____ floodgate
quiz.explanation: 水闸，打开水闸。This decision will open floodgate. 这个决定会打开水闸。

quiz.question: variegate ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 使多样化，使花园多样化。Various flowers variegate the garden. 各种花使花园多样化。

quiz.question: relegate __ _______
quiz.explanation: 降级，降级到次要位置。They would relegate to seconds. 他们会降级到次要位置。

quiz.question: negate ________
quiz.explanation: 否定，否定论点。Evidence would negate argument. 证据会否定论点。

quiz.question: abnegate ____
quiz.explanation: 放弃，放弃自我。Saints would abnegate self. 圣人会放弃自我。

quiz.question: aggregate ______
quiz.explanation: 总计，总需求。Economists study aggregate demand. 经济学家研究总需求。
